casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Henry RAINES. No. 211A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 23, 2007. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for William Henry Raines. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of April 2007 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 23rd day of May 2007 to file and serve his/her brief *379with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of April 2007."
